1.0.3.name: wordpress/teamspeak-3-viewer-plugin-for-wordpress-widget
1.0.3.description:
NEW in 1.0.3: I got a lot of Mails with Setup-Problems: The New Version has a more usabile Optionspanel. If you had already installed the Widget: You CAN remove the Queryport and the :, but the new Version also Supports the old Syntax

Allows to show the Users and Channels of a Teamspeak3 as a Widget ( TS VIEWER )

Credits

Uses the Teamspeak 3 Framework by ScP from the teamspeak forum
